meanings.definition: A small, round object used in the game of quoits.
meanings.sent1: I found a shiny coit on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The children played with the coit in the park.
meanings.sent3: The coit rolled away, making the players chase after it.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like a polished coit in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The coit felt smooth and cool in his hand as he tossed it.

meanings.definition: To throw a coit in the game of quoits.
meanings.sent1: He practiced his aim to coit accurately.
meanings.sent2: She coits with precision and skill.
meanings.sent3: The way he coits always makes us laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her words coit through the silence of the room.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the coit hitting the target echoed in the air.

meanings.definition: A circular band used in the game of quoits.
meanings.sent1: The coit landed perfectly on the metal ring.
meanings.sent2: The players aimed to toss the coit onto the band.
meanings.sent3: The coit band gleamed brightly under the sun.
meanings.sent4: The coit band encircled the wooden post snugly.
meanings.sent5: The clink of the coit against the band signaled a successful throw.
